Public Types | Public Member Functions | Static Public Member Functions | Protected Member Functions

wxExSTC Class Reference

Offers a styled text ctrl with find/replace, printing, popup menu, macro support, vi support and lexer support (syntax colouring, folding). More...

#include <wx/extension/stc.h>

}

 Shows a dialog with options, returns dialog return code.

Protected Member Functions

virtual void BuildPopupMenu (wxExMenu &menu)
 Builds the popup menu.

Detailed Description

Offers a styled text ctrl with find/replace, printing, popup menu, macro support, vi support and lexer support (syntax colouring, folding).

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum wxExSTC::wxExConfigFlags

Config dialog flags (0 gives a modal dialog with all options).

Enumerator:
STC_CONFIG_MODELESS 

use as modeless dialog

STC_CONFIG_WITH_APPLY 

add the apply button

STC_CONFIG_SIMPLE 

only 'simple' options on dialog

enum wxExSTC::wxExMenuFlags

Menu and tooltip flags (0 is used for no menu).

Enumerator:
STC_MENU_SIMPLE 

for adding copy/paste etc. menu

STC_MENU_FIND 

for adding find menu

STC_MENU_REPLACE 

for adding replace menu

STC_MENU_OPEN_LINK 

for adding link open menu

STC_MENU_DEFAULT 

all

enum wxExSTC::wxExWindowFlags

Window flags (0 is used as default).

Enumerator:
STC_WIN_READ_ONLY 

window is readonly, this mode overrides real mode from disk

STC_WIN_HEX 

window in hex mode

STC_WIN_FROM_OTHER 

opened from within another file (e.g. a link)

Member Function Documentation

void wxExSTC::AppendTextForced ( const wxString &  text,
bool  withTimestamp = true 
)

Appends text, possibly with timestamp, even if the document is readonly.

If caret was at end, it is repositioned at the end.

static int wxExSTC::ConfigDialog ( wxWindow *  parent,
const wxString &  title = _("Editor Options"),
long  flags = 0,
wxWindowID  id = wxID_ANY 
) [static]

Shows a dialog with options, returns dialog return code.

If used modeless, it uses the dialog id as specified, so you can use that id in wxExFrame::OnCommandConfigDialog.

void wxExSTC::ControlCharDialog ( const wxString &  caption = _("Enter Control Character")  ) 

Edit the current selected char as a control char, or if nothing selected, add a new control char.

bool wxExSTC::FindNext ( const wxString &  text,
int  search_flags = 0,
bool  find_next = true 
)

Finds next.

Parameters:
text text to find
search_flags search flags to be used wxSTC_FIND_WHOLEWORD wxSTC_FIND_MATCHCASE wxSTC_FIND_WORDSTART wxSTC_FIND_REGEXP wxSTC_FIND_POSIX
find_next finds next or previous
const wxString wxExSTC::GetEOL (  )  const

Gets EOL string.

If you only want to insert a newline, use NewLine() (from wxStyledTextCtrl).

const wxString wxExSTC::GetFindString (  )  const

Gets find string, from selected text or from config.

The search flags are taken from frd. If text is selected, it also sets the find string.

void wxExSTC::GuessType (  ) 

Guesses the file type using a small sample size from this document, and sets EOL mode and updates statusbar if it found eols.

bool wxExSTC::IsTargetRE ( const wxString &  target  )  const

Returns true if specified target is a RE, to be used by ReplaceTargetRE.

virtual bool wxExSTC::Open ( const wxExFileName &  filename,
int  line_number = 0,
const wxString &  match = wxEmptyString,
long  flags = 0 
) [virtual]

Opens the file, reads the content into the window, then closes the file and sets the lexer.

Parameters:
filename file to open
line_number goes to the line if > 0, if -1 goes to end of file
match if not empty selects the text on that line.
flags flags

Reimplemented in wxExSTCWithFrame.

int wxExSTC::ReplaceAll ( const wxString &  find_text,
const wxString &  replace_text 
)

Replaces all text.

It there is a selection, it replaces in the selection, otherwise in the entire document. Returns the number of replacements.

bool wxExSTC::ReplaceNext ( bool  find_next  ) 

Replaces text and calls find next.

Uses settings from find replace data.

bool wxExSTC::ReplaceNext ( const wxString &  find_text,
const wxString &  replace_text,
int  search_flags = 0,
bool  find_next = true 
)

Replaces text and calls find next.

It there is a selection, it replaces in the selection, otherwise it starts at current position.

Parameters:
find_text text to find
replace_text text to replace with
search_flags search flags to be used wxSTC_FIND_WHOLEWORD wxSTC_FIND_MATCHCASE wxSTC_FIND_WORDSTART wxSTC_FIND_REGEXP wxSTC_FIND_POSIX
find_next argument passed on to FindNext
void wxExSTC::ResetMargins ( bool  divider_margin = true  ) 

Reset all margins.

Default also resets the divider margin.

void wxExSTC::SetLexerProperty ( const wxString &  name,
const wxString &  value 
)

Sets lexer prop name and value, but does not apply them.

void wxExSTC::StartRecord (  ) 

Starts recording the macro, and empties the previous one.

There is only one shared macro for all objects.
